    • Method Detail

      • start

        public ImageList start(String searchParam,
                       ImageList imageList,
                       boolean runOnce,
                       long delay,
                       boolean lazyLoad)
        Description copied from class: ImageLoader
        Starts the loader.
        Specified by:
        start in class ImageLoader
        Parameters:
        searchParam - The search parameter.
        imageList - The ImageList, which should be used.
        runOnce - If the value is set to true, the loader will only run once.
        delay - The delay between two loading tasks. (milliseconds)
        lazyLoad - Indicates if the load process is lazy or not. Use lazy mode to save memory space.
        Returns:
        The used ImageList.
